# Tests that the x-go-type json.RawMessage type is converted to json.RawMessage

openapi-httprequest api.yaml
cmp api-params.go expect-api-params.go

-- api.yaml --
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  description: test service description
  title: test service
  version: 1.0.0
paths:
  /test:
    get:
      description: Get test data (description)
      operationId: GetTestData
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/GetTestDataResponse'
      summary: Get test data
components:
  schemas:
    GetTestDataResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        metadata:
          x-go-type: json.RawMessage
          description: json message

-- expect-api-params.go --
// Code generated by openapi-httprequest. DO NOT EDIT.

package params

import (
	"encoding/json"

	httprequest "gopkg.in/httprequest.v1"
)

type APIHandler interface {
	// Get test data
	GetTestData(httprequest.Params, *GetTestDataRequest) (*GetTestDataResponse, error)
}

type GetTestDataResponse struct {
	// json message
	Metadata json.RawMessage `json:"metadata,omitempty"`
}

// GetTestDataRequest holds the request value for a GetTestData call.
// Get test data (description)
type GetTestDataRequest struct {
	httprequest.Route `httprequest:"GET /test"`
}
